message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still aiming to keep the cost below $15,000. Could we perhaps agree on $14,000?
